title: How do I convert my league of legends replays from the client into files that can be uploaded?
body: Right now on my computer where the replays are saved (from Riot's new system) it says that the files are ROFL files. Whatever that means. How can I convert it to an MP4 for youtube?

replies.body: Replays are still new and in testing so there's still a lot of knowledge to gain.  Per the [Replay FAQ](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/234965248-Replays-FAQ-Pro-Tips), You should be able to record your games as a .webm and view it through your browser.  I'm not sure if you can currently upload it to Youtube, but I could be wrong.  I suggest sharing your feedback and asking over at the [client discussion](http://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/alpha-client-discussion) boards in case there are other options.  Good luck!
